name: Java CI with Maven

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "main" ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Set up JDK 21
      uses: actions/setup-java@v4
      with:
        java-version: '21'
        distribution: 'temurin' # Temurin is the standard OpenJDK distribution
        cache: maven

    - name: Build with Maven
      # 'verify' runs integration tests (failsafe) and unit tests (surefire)
      run: mvn -B verify --file pom.xml

    - name: Upload Test Coverage
      # Uploads the Jacoco report so you can download it from GitHub
      if: always() 
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: coverage-report
        path: '**/target/site/jacoco/'
